      • setVerbosity

        public static void setVerbosity(int v)
        Sets the verbosity of the logger. Message verbosities are set while logging.
        Parameters:
        v - The new level of verbosity.

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String message,
                       int messageVerbosity)
        Log a message
        Parameters:
        message - The message to log
        messageVerbosity - The verbosity of the message. If the user's setting has lower verbosity, it won't be displayed.
